# Bible Verse Randomizer

> Free random Bible verse generator and comprehensive Scripture resource. Explore 31,000+ verses by topic, occasion, or book.

## About

Bible Verse Randomizer helps people discover God's Word through a random verse generator, topical browsing, and occasion-based Scripture discovery. The site covers all 66 books of the Bible with summaries, themes, and key verses.

## Main Sections

- [Home](https://bibleverserandomizer.com/): Random Bible verse generator with topic filtering
- [Browse by Topic](https://bibleverserandomizer.com/topics): Bible verses organized by theme — love, faith, hope, forgiveness, strength, and more
- [Browse by Occasion](https://bibleverserandomizer.com/for): Find the perfect verse for weddings, funerals, tattoos, graduations, and hundreds of life situations
- [Books of the Bible](https://bibleverserandomizer.com/books): All 66 books with summaries, themes, chapter counts, and key verses
- [Daily Verse](https://bibleverserandomizer.com/daily): A new Bible verse every day

## Content Types

### Topic Pages (/topic/[slug])
Each topic page contains curated Bible verses about a specific theme (e.g., love, faith, healing). Verses are selected based on keyword relevance and include the full text from the NIV translation.

### Occasion Pages (/for/[slug])
Occasion pages help users find Bible verses for specific life events or situations — weddings, funerals, graduations, tattoos, comfort in grief, and more. Verses are categorized by situation type.

### Book Pages (/book/[slug])
Book overview pages cover all 66 books of the Bible with:
- Author and approximate date written
- Chapter and verse counts
- Comprehensive summary
- Key themes with descriptions
- Notable key verses

## Data Sources

Content is sourced from public domain Bible translations and curated by the Bible Verse Randomizer editorial team. All verse text is from established Bible translations.
